surepy.data.properties.max_distance module¶

surepy.data.properties.max_distance.max_distance(locdata)[source]¶

Return maximum distance between any two localizations in locdata.

Parameters:locdata (LocData) – localization data
Returns:A dict with key being the property name and the value being the maximum distance between any two localizations in locdata.
Return type:dict
